你好 Since  https://t.co/2iYDjqqIZY seems to get quite some visitors from #china. I integrated some basic support for #Chinese (e.g., correct #IOTA trytes and #IPFS buffer conversion). But further improvement is needed. Feel free to help me with it:  https://t.co/AGfCok5k9g #Dweb

85 people's #IOTA were stolen a year ago => phishy website - IOTA foundation has from the start worked with the police to get this criminal. Finally the authorities apparently got him. NEVER USE SEEDS CREATED FROM WEBSITES
